Faster way of producing a coke. Put a <item>Coal Dust</> into a <machine>Coke Oven</>.
This is just improved version of machine. It can make complexer recipes without penalty and can use modules.
This is a really fast way to travel. You need to select it on the hotbar to use. Press jump to use.

While it is possible to create all machines directly from ingots - this is not the best way.
In a much more efficient way, it will create plates with the help of <machine>Automatic Hammer</>
It creates 1 plate of 1 ingot, while hands creates 1 plate of 2 ingots.
You will receive 1.5 times more metal from ore by making this item.
Uses fuel to produce a <item>Heat</>. The Heat is fransferring into block on top of a furnace. Heat output is marked by flame icon.
Uses heat to make recipes. Usable to increase fuel efficiency by producing Coal Dust from a <item>Log</>/<item>Stick</>/<item>Sawdust</>.
Uses heat to make ingots. Ingots are smelted from ore very slowly. It is much more efficient to refine an ore before smelting.

Used for advanced steel making process. Uses less coke in the process, and also has a much higher production rate.
The resulting cast iron must be melted in an <machine>Arc Furnace.</>
Common ore. Occurs in all biomes. Plenty of <item>Copper Ore</> can be found at a coast. You can see a water from some hill.
Common ore. Occurs in all biomes. Plenty of <item>Iron Ore</> can be found in the swamp.
Right click on a Bed to update your Spawnpoint. You can travel to a Spawnpoint from the Pause Menu (Esc).
Can be gathered from most of small plants in the world.
Growing bamboo sprout. Break with a <item>Multitool</> to harvest.
Growing pumpkin. Break with a <item>Multitool</> to harvest.
It has 2 inputs: one for <item>Iron Ingots</>, the other for a coke. To output a production use a <machine>Robot Arm</>.
Has input for a coal and output for a coke. Has fluid output for an <item>Ore Water</> marked with drop icon.
